name: p6
description: ### Installation instructions * Install node by downloading and running node from (nodejs.org)[https://nodejs.org]. * Run ```npm install npm -g``` at the command line to get the latest version. Note that you may need to run ```sudo npm install npm-g``` depending on your system. * Clone this project from (GitHub)[]. * Change the cloned directory. * Run ```npm install``` to get project dependencies. * Change into the ```dist``` directory. * Run a web server (e.g. ```python -m SimpleHTTPServer```) * At another command line prompt, type ```./ngrok http [port number provided web server]```.
